document.docAuthor: Erman, Orhan, Gülle, Pinar, Özkan, Muhlis, Candoğan, Hülya & Boyaci, Yunus Ömer
document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of the water mites (Acari: Hydrachnidia) of Turkey: First supplement

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of the water mites (Acari: Hydrachnidia) of Turkey: First supplement

subSubSection.paragraph: Habitat: Streams large springs.
Distribution: Central, Eastern Europe including the Alps and Turkey .
Records from Turkey : Erzurum Province (Esen et al. 2013b).
Habitat: Streams.
Distribution: Turkey
Records from Turkey : Adana Province ( Gerecke, 2009 ).

Remark: In the list of
Erman et al. 2010
inadvertently not included.
Habitat: Middle order streams.
Distribution: Western Palaearctic and Turkey .
Records from Turkey : Kahramanmaraş Province ( Esen & Erman 2015b ).
Habitat: Limnocrene spring.
Distribution: Turkey .
Records from Turkey : Isparta and Denizli Province (Gülle & Boyacı 2012).

Remark:
Lebertia martini
was the frst
Lebertia
species having dorsal plates recorded from the Palaearctic. Presence of plates, combined with the very stout palps will allow an easy distinction from all other
Lebertia
species in the region (Gülle & Boyacı 2012).
Habitat: Springs.
Distribution: Turkey .
Records from Turkey : Erzincan Province (Esen et al. 2013a).
Habitat: Streams.
Distribution: Central, Eastern and Southern Europe and Turkey .
Records from Turkey : Kahramanmaraş Province ( Esen & Erman 2015b ).
Habitat: Large rheocrenes, limnocrenes and cold lakes in high mountains.
Distribution: Central and Eastern Europe and Turkey .
Habitat: Streams.
Distribution: Central and Southeastern Europe and Turkey .
Records from Turkey : Bingöl Province (Esen et al. 2013b).
Habitat: Standing waters.
Distribution: Alps and Turkey .
Habitat: Pools of higher order streams.
Distribution: Extended parts of the Palaearctic and Turkey .
Habitat: Mostly in pools of streams, rarely in larger standing waters.
Distribution: Central–northern Europe and Turkey .
Records from Turkey : Kahramanmaraş and Siirt Province ( Esen & Erman 2015b ).
Habitat: Standing waters.
Distribution: Cetral Europe (Northern Alps and Pprealps), Turkey .
Records from Turkey : Antalya Province ( Esen & Erman 2015b ).
Habitat: Standing waters, potamal of streams.
Distribution: Europe and Turkey . Scattered records.
Habitat: Springs.
Distribution: Central and southern Europe and Turkey .
Records from Turkey : Malatya Province ( Esen & Erman 2012 ).
Habitat: Low order streams and springs.
Distribution: Europe and Turkey .
Records from Turkey : Artvin Province ( Esen & Erman 2015b ).
Habitat: Springs.
Distribution: Central and southeastern Europe and Turkey , rare.
Habitat: Springs and low order streams.
Distribution: Northern, western and central Europe and Turkey .
Records from Turkey : Erzincan Province (Esen et al. 2013b).
Habitat: Pools of a cold stream rich in gravels and moss vegetation, in shaded areas.
Distribution: Turkey .
Records from Turkey : Bingöl Province ( Esen & Erman 2015b ).
Habitat: Weakly seeping helocrenes.
Distribution: Central and Western Europe, Carpathians and Turkey , rare.
